history.proof: intros m. apply (fun p : mon n * bool => fst p). shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)
gb: mon n * bool -> bool

Goal:
mon n * bool -> mon n

Premises:
CoefStructure : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A), A -> forall eqA : A -> A -> Prop, (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) -> Prop
mult_mon : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> mon d
Inductive mon : nat -> Set := n_0 : mon 0 | c_n : forall d : nat, nat -> mon d -> mon (S d) Arguments mon _%nat_scope Arguments c_n (_ _)%nat_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
OrderStructure : forall A : Type, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> (A -> A -> A) -> Prop
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
zero_mon : forall d : nat, mon d
divTerm : Term A n -> forall b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> Term A n
ltM_nonrefl : forall (A : Type) (M1 : A) (ltM : A -> A -> Prop) (plusM : A -> A -> A), OrderStructure A M1 ltM plusM -> forall x : A, ~ ltM x x
M1_min : forall (A : Type) (M1 : A) (ltM : A -> A -> Prop) (plusM : A -> A -> A), OrderStructure A M1 ltM plusM -> forall x : A, ~ ltM x M1
ltM_plusr : forall (A : Type) (M1 : A) (ltM : A -> A -> Prop) (plusM : A -> A -> A), OrderStructure A M1 ltM plusM -> forall x y z : A, ltM x y -> ltM (plusM x z) (plusM y z)
ltM_plusl : forall (A : Type) (M1 : A) (ltM : A -> A -> Prop) (plusM : A -> A -> A), OrderStructure A M1 ltM plusM -> forall x y z : A, ltM x y -> ltM (plusM z x) (plusM z y)
multTerm : forall A : Type, (A -> A -> A) -> forall n : nat, Term A n -> Term A n -> Term A n
ltM_trans : forall (A : Type) (M1 : A) (ltM : A -> A -> Prop) (plusM : A -> A -> A), OrderStructure A M1 ltM plusM -> transitive A ltM
zeroP : forall A : Type, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> forall n : nat, Term A n -> Prop
plus_minus_le : forall a b : nat, a - b + b = a -> b <= a
div_mon_clean : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> mon d * bool
ltM_wf : forall (A : Type) (M1 : A) (ltM : A -> A -> Prop) (plusM : A -> A -> A), OrderStructure A M1 ltM plusM -> well_founded ltM
mdiv_div : forall (d : nat) (a b : mon d), mdiv d b a -> mult_mon d (div_mon d a b) b = a
transitive : forall A : Type, relation A -> Prop
Minus.le_plus_minus : forall n m : nat, n <= m -> m = n + (m - n)
div_clean_dec2 : forall (d : nat) (a b : mon d), (let (_, b0) := div_mon_clean d a b in b0) = false -> mult_mon d (div_mon d a b) b <> a
mult_div_com : forall (d : nat) (a b : mon d), div_mon d (mult_mon d a b) b = a
div_clean_dec1 : forall (d : nat) (a b : mon d), (let (_, b0) := div_mon_clean d a b in b0) = true -> (let (m, _) := div_mon_clean d a b in m) = div_mon d a b /\ mult_mon d (div_mon d a b) b = a
ppcm_mom_is_ppcm : forall (d : nat) (a b c : mon d), c = mult_mon d (div_mon d c a) a -> c = mult_mon d (div_mon d c b) b -> c = mult_mon d (div_mon d c (ppcm_mon d a b)) (ppcm_mon d a b)
mult_mon_assoc : forall (d : nat) (a b c : mon d), mult_mon d a (mult_mon d b c) = mult_mon d (mult_mon d a b) c
mult_mon_com : forall (d : nat) (a b : mon d), mult_mon d a b = mult_mon d b a
mon_ind : forall P : forall n : nat, mon n -> Prop, P 0 n_0 -> (forall (d n : nat) (m : mon d), P d m -> P (S d) (c_n d n m)) -> forall (n : nat) (m : mon n), P n m
div_mon : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> mon d
ppcm_mon : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> mon d
ppcm_prop_r : forall (d : nat) (a b : mon d), ppcm_mon d a b = mult_mon d (div_mon d (ppcm_mon d a b) b) b
c_n : forall d : nat, nat -> mon d -> mon (S d)
ppcm_prop_l : forall (d : nat) (a b : mon d), ppcm_mon d a b = mult_mon d (div_mon d (ppcm_mon d a b) a) a
mdiv_ind : forall P : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> Prop, P 0 n_0 n_0 -> (forall (d : nat) (v v' : mon d) (n n' : nat), n <= n' -> mdiv d v v' -> P d v v' -> P (S d) (c_n d n v) (c_n d n' v')) -> forall (d : nat) (m m0 : mon d), mdiv d m m0 -> P d m m0
Term = fun (A : Type) (n : nat) => (A * mon n)%type : Type -> nat -> Type Arguments Term _%type_scope _%nat_scope
Inductive mon : nat -> Set := n_0 : mon 0 | c_n : forall d : nat, nat -> mon d -> mon (S d) Arguments mon _%nat_scope Arguments c_n (_ _)%nat_scope
pmon2 : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon (Nat.pred d)
pmon1 : forall d : nat, mon d -> nat
Inductive mdiv : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> Prop := mdiv_nil : mdiv 0 n_0 n_0 | mdiv_cons : forall (d : nat) (v v' : mon d) (n n' : nat), n <= n' -> mdiv d v v' -> mdiv (S d) (c_n d n v) (c_n d n' v') Arguments mdiv _%nat_scope Arguments mdiv_cons _%nat_scope _ _ (_ _)%nat_scope
Max.max_case : forall (n m : nat) (P : nat -> Type), P n -> P m -> P (PeanoNat.Nat.max n m)
Lt.le_not_lt : forall n m : nat, n <= m -> ~ m < n
mult_mon_zero_r : forall (d : nat) (a : mon d), mult_mon d a (zero_mon d) = a
mult_mon_zero_l : forall (d : nat) (a : mon d), mult_mon d (zero_mon d) a = a
PeanoNat.Nat.add_assoc : forall n m p : nat, n + (m + p) = n + m + p
mon_0 : forall a : mon 0, a = n_0
PeanoNat.Nat.add_comm : forall n m : nat, n + m = m + n
minus_lt_0 : forall m n : nat, n < m -> n - m = 0
